title: Fireball

Level 3 Evocation Spell

Shoot a bright flame from your fingers that explodes upon contact, torching everything in the vicinity.

On Save: Targets still take half damage.

Fireball is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Fireball is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Fireball Information

Description: Shoot a bright flame from your fingers that explodes upon contact, torching everything in the vicinity. On Save: Targets still take half damage. Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Evocation School Casting Time:Action Range:18m6m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: DEX Save

How to Acquire Fireball

Fireball can be acquired by the following classes: Sorcerer, Wizard, Warlock, Light Domain Fireball can be cast by using the following Items: Crooked Wand of Fireballs: Range: Melee (basically self-destruct) / Use: Short Rest / Location: Underdark - Decrepit Village [X:55, Y:-184] There will be 2 Dead Duergar and an Executed Deep Gnome. The item should be on the Deep Gnome. You can avoid the damage if user is an evocation wizard. Incandescent Staff
